title: Hextech chest
body: I dont know why but im not getting  any hextech chest plz help me riot :) plzzzzzz i have only keys

replies.body:
Have you been earning S-, S or S+ grades for your performance in matches? That's part of the requirements in order to earn one. You can find out more about how to earn chests and the loot system in our [**Hextech Crafting Guide.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide)

Please let me know if this caused any changes for you.
